mapper.sql: select b.blno, b.cdt, b.dates, b.bl_rsn, b.unbl_rsn, u.uno, u.nick blocked_nick, u.email blocked_email from block b inner join user u on b.uno=u.uno
mapper.insert: insert into block(uno, cdt, dates, bl_rsn) values( (select ar.writer from report rp inner join repo_arc rpa on rp.rpno = rpa.rpno inner join article ar on rpa.arno = ar.arno where rp.rpno=#{report.no}) , now(), #{blockedDates}, #{blockedReason})
mapper.select:
where u.nick like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by b.blno desc
where u.uno=#{reportedUser.no} and now() <= date_add(b.cdt, interval b.dates day)
